SEARCH
Package lt.techin.library

Interface BookCatalog

public interface BookCatalog
Interface representing a catalog of books in a library.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addBook(Book book)
    Adds a book to the catalog.
    BigDecimal
    calculateTotalPrice()
    Calculates the total price of all books in the catalog.
    List<Book>
    filterBooks(Predicate<Book> criteria)
    Filters books based on a given criteria, such as publication year or price range.
    Book
    findNewestBookByPublisher(String publisher)
    Searches for the newest book by a given publisher.
    Book
    getBookByIsbn(String isbn)
    Retrieves a book by its ISBN.
    List<Book>
    getSortedBooks()
    Sorts books first by publication year, then by title, then by page count.
    int
    getTotalNumberOfBooks()
    Gets the total number of books in the catalog.
    Map<String,List<Book>>

    Groups books by publisher.

    Checks if a book with a given ISBN is available.

    searchBooksByAuthor(String authorName)
    Searches for books by a specific author.

  • Method Details

    • addBook

      void addBook(Book book)
      Adds a book to the catalog. The book must not be null, and must have a non-null, non-empty ISBN and title. A book with the same ISBN should not already exist in the catalog.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to add.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the book is null, or has null/empty ISBN or title.

    • getBookByIsbn

      Book getBookByIsbn(String isbn)
      Retrieves a book by its ISBN. Throws a BookNotFoundException if no book with the given ISBN is found.
      Parameters:
      isbn - The ISBN of the book to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The book with the specified ISBN.
      Throws:
      BookNotFoundException - If no book with the given ISBN is found.

    • searchBooksByAuthor

      List<Book> searchBooksByAuthor(String authorName)
      Searches for books by a specific author.
      Parameters:
      authorName - The name of the author.
      Returns:
      A list of books by the specified author.

    • getTotalNumberOfBooks

      int getTotalNumberOfBooks()
      Gets the total number of books in the catalog.
      Returns:
      The total number of books.

    • isBookInCatalog

      boolean isBookInCatalog(String isbn)
      Checks if a book with a given ISBN is in the catalog.
      Parameters:
      isbn - The ISBN of the book to check.
      Returns:
      true if the book is in the catalog, false otherwise.

    • isBookAvailable

      boolean isBookAvailable(String isbn)
      Checks if a book with a given ISBN is available.
      Parameters:
      isbn - The ISBN of the book to check.
      Returns:
      true if the book is available, false otherwise.

    • findNewestBookByPublisher

      Book findNewestBookByPublisher(String publisher)
      Searches for the newest book by a given publisher. Throws a BookNotFoundException if no book from the given publisher is found.
      Parameters:
      publisher - The publisher to search for.
      Returns:
      The newest book by the given publisher.
      Throws:
      BookNotFoundException - If no book from the given publisher is found.

    • getSortedBooks

      List<Book> getSortedBooks()
      Sorts books first by publication year, then by title, then by page count.
      Returns:
      A list of sorted books.

    • groupBooksByPublisher

      Map<String,List<Book>> groupBooksByPublisher()
      Groups books by publisher.
      Returns:
      A map where each key is a publisher and the value is a list of books by that publisher.

    • filterBooks

      List<Book> filterBooks(Predicate<Book> criteria)
      Filters books based on a given criteria, such as publication year or price range.
      Parameters:
      criteria - The criteria to filter books.
      Returns:
      A list of books that meet the criteria.

    • calculateTotalPrice

      BigDecimal calculateTotalPrice()
      Calculates the total price of all books in the catalog.
      Returns:
      The total price of all books.
